para.text: This title shall only apply to the conduct of employers and employees in the District to the extent it does not conflict with, or is not preempted by, federal law, regulation, or standard.

To the extent a Mayor's Order issued pursuant to §§ 7-2304 and 7-2304.01 is related to the wearing of PPE and requires employers, employees, or other individuals to adhere to stricter safety standards, policies, or protocols than those required under § 32-141.02, the Mayor's Order shall control.
